name: S - S - Air conditioning
Pre-start checks
Area/base/wall ready for outdoor unit
Pipework route all clear, penetrations complete
Nogs/ply in place for indoor unit
Drain 1m from indoor unit location by plumber
First Fix
Complete length of pipework is insulated and acceptable
Drain installed and insulated
Supply cable installed correctly, protected and secured
Outdoor wall brackets in place
Interconnecting cables correctly installed and protected
All seismic restraints in place (if needed)
Mechanical First Fix complete and acceptable
Second Fix
System pressure checked and still holding pressure and acceptable
Correct Indoor unit installed, level and tight to wall and acceptable
Correct Outdoor unit installed and secure
Indoor unit serial no. recorded
Outdoor Unit serial no. recorded
Indoor unit run, fan speeds, modes etc. are acceptable
Air conditioning Second Fix complete and acceptable
Commissioning
Installer confirmed commissioned and paperwork submitted
Commissioning paperwork reviewed and accepted by Project Manager
Electrical testing complete
Commissioning complete and acceptable
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
S - S - Ventilation - Apartment Ventilation
Pre-start checks
Penetrations done in floors and walls (if needed)
Space for ducting (no trades in the way)
Pipe through exterior wall installed by RHC to connect to
Drawings and work scope confirmed
First Fix
Ductwork run straight level and well supported
All ductwork joints sealed
All SAB joints sealed and taped
All flexible ducts cable tied and taped to duct
All seismic restraints in place (if needed)
Flexible ducts fixed in place to grille location
Grille locations/access panels marked on plans
Mechanical First Fix complete
Second Fix
Ceiling fans installed square and level
Kitchen range hood installed by RHC to connect to
Fingerprints removed from grilles/walls/ceilings
Fan plugged in before install to ceiling
External louver supplied by TSL, installed by RHC completed
Commissioning form completed & given to TSL
Mechanical Second Fix complete
Commissioning
Correct product used as per requirements
Correct design followed as per drawings
Mechanical Plant commissioned
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
